text: Mesechthistatus taniguchii is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Seki in 1944.BioLib.cz - Mesechthistatus taniguchii. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. It is found in Japan and in Jiangxi, China. ==Subspecies== * Mesechthistatus taniguchii hayashii Yokoyama, 1969 * Mesechthistatus taniguchii taniguchii (Seki, 1944) ==References== ==Further reading== * Category:Phrissomini Category:Beetles described in 1944
title: Mesechthistatus taniguchii
